msg: Unify the behavior across platforms. If there is no -user provide, do not try to switch to it

author: buscob
msg: Used the standard xxxxFormOnly pattern to handle the ajax update of this screen.
No need to use this too complicated GenericScreenletAjaxWithMenu stuff.
The portlet attributes must not be used to select artifact to be rendered in a portlet. This creates security issues.
In next commits I will remove all the GenericPortlet stuff.

msg: LUCENE-2710: reproduce-with on test failure isnt right if you manually override things
